alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 24 at 2:49AM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Northeast Louisiana, far southeast Arkansas, and much of central and southern Mississippi. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Additional heavy rainfall is expected across much of the forecast area today into this evening, which will fall onto already saturated ground and lead to flooding in some areas. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
